short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Be motivated every time you open a new tab. Replaces the new tab page with a real time age counter accurate to 9 decimal places.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Customizations:
- Name
- Birthdate and time
- Background gradient

Background gradients:
- Red
- Orange
- Yellow
- Green
- Light Blue
- Dark Blue
- Purple
- Gray
- Black
- Random (one of the above gradients is chosen every time a new tab opens)
